languages.text: "Ваше наблюдение весьма точно. Астротраектории указывают на то, что все, кроме одного, светила являются чужеродными этой системе. Каким-то образом остальные звезды были... доставлены сюда извне".
"Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being alien to this system. The other stars were... somehow transported here from the outside."
languages.original_text: "Ваше наблюдение весьма точно. Астротраектории указывают на то, что все, кроме одного, светила являются чужеродными этой системе. Каким-то образом остальные звезды были... доставлены сюда извне".

traits.locale_text: "Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being extraneous to this system. The other stars were... transported here from the outside by some means."

"Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being extraneous to this system. The other stars were... transported here from the outside by some means."
"Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being alien to this system. The other stars were... somehow transported here from the outside."
"Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being alien to this system. The other stars were... somehow transported here from the outside."
"Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being alien to this system. The other stars were... somehow transported here from the outside."

languages.text: “您的观察很准确。这些恒星的轨迹表明，只有一颗恒星原本属于这个星系。其它的恒星……都是通过某种手段，从别的地方运过来的。”
languages.original_text: "Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being alien to this system. The other stars were... somehow transported here from the outside."

traits.locale_text: “您的观察很准确。这些恒星的轨迹表明，只有一颗恒星原本属于这个星系。其它的恒星……都是通过某种手段，从别的地方运过来的。”

languages.text: « Votre observation est tout à fait juste. Les trajectoires stellaires indiquent qu'à l'exception d'une seule, toutes les étoiles de ce système lui sont étrangères. Les autres ont été... transportées jusqu'ici, d'une manière ou d'une autre. »
languages.original_text: "Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being alien to this system. The other stars were... somehow transported here from the outside."

traits.locale_text: « Votre observation est tout à fait juste. Les trajectoires stellaires indiquent qu'à l'exception d'une seule, toutes les étoiles de ce système lui sont étrangères. Les autres ont été... transportées jusqu'ici, d'une manière ou d'une autre. »

languages.text: "Eure Beobachtung ist ziemlich genau. Die stellaren Flugbahnen zeigen, dass alle Sterne hier im System bis auf einen fremd sind. Die anderen Sterne wurden ... irgendwie von woanders hierhertransportiert."
languages.original_text: "Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being alien to this system. The other stars were... somehow transported here from the outside."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Beobachtung ist ziemlich genau. Die stellaren Flugbahnen zeigen, dass alle Sterne hier im System bis auf einen fremd sind. Die anderen Sterne wurden ... irgendwie von woanders hierhertransportiert."

languages.text: «Una observación muy acertada, pues las trayectorias estelares indican que todas menos una de las estrellas no pertenecen a este sistema. Alguien o algo las ha... transportado aquí desde otro sitio».
languages.original_text: "Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being alien to this system. The other stars were... somehow transported here from the outside."

traits.locale_text: «Una observación muy acertada, pues las trayectorias estelares indican que todas menos una de las estrellas no pertenecen a este sistema. Alguien o algo las ha... transportado aquí desde otro sitio».

languages.text: 「あなたの観察は極めて正確です。恒星の軌跡は、ひとつの恒星を除いて、すべてこの星系の外部からやってきた星であることを示しています。それら他の星は…何らかの方法で外から運ばれてきました」
languages.original_text: "Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being alien to this system. The other stars were... somehow transported here from the outside."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの観察は極めて正確です。恒星の軌跡は、ひとつの恒星を除いて、すべてこの星系の外部からやってきた星であることを示しています。それら他の星は…何らかの方法で外から運ばれてきました」

languages.text: "Gözleminiz son derece isabetli. Yıldız yörüngeleri, bu sistemdeki bir yıldız hariç hepsinin başka bir yerden geldiğine işaret ediyor. Diğer yıldızlar... Bir şekilde dışarıdan getirilmiş."
languages.original_text: "Your observation is quite accurate. The stellar trajectories point to all but one of the stars being alien to this system. The other stars were... somehow transported here from the outside."
